target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>Von nun an werden die gewünschten Gegenstände einmal pro Woche zufällig aus den bisherigen Sammlerstücken ausgewählt.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTRANKUP_001_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with Zhloe and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTRANKUP_001_002<tab>Sprich mit Zhloe Aliapoh und wähle „Gewünschte Sammlerstücke bei Zhloe abliefern“, um die Liste einzusehen.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTRANKUP_001_003<tab>Note that orphanage donations, rainbow pigment, and river shrimp will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTRANKUP_001_003<tab>Besonders große Belohnungen winken bei „Waisenhaus-Spenden“, „Regenbogen-Farbpigmenten“ und „Flussgarnelen“ - du solltest dich also auf Lieferungen konzentrieren, die diese Dinge enthalten.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_001_000<tab>Why, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You've been working your tail off this week, haven't you? Speaking of tails, I really wish the orphan boys would stop pulling mine. Don't they realize how much that hurts?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_001_000<tab>Herzlichen Dank für die vielen Lieferungen!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_001_001<tab>Anyway, I think you've earned yourself a much-needed rest. Don't go too far, though─Zhloe's counting on you to help keep Menphina's Arms going strong!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_001_001<tab>Man merkt, wie wichtig es dir ist, den Waisenkindern zu helfen. Ich hoffe, dass ich auch in Zukunft auf deine Hilfe und deinen Elan zählen kann!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_002_000<tab>Working as hard as ever, I see! Wherever would Zhloe be without you? Out on the street eating stale flatbread and month-old pineapple pudding, that's where!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_002_000<tab>Diese Woche hast du dich wieder richtig ins Zeug gelegt! Herzlichen Dank!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_002_001<tab>Still, don't forget to give yourself a rest from time to time! Can I interest you in a bowl of pineapple pudding? <sniff> <sniff> I don't <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> it's rotten yet.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_002_001<tab>Überanstrenge dich aber bitte nicht. Wenn du krank wirst und als <var 08 E905 ((Lieferantin)) ((Lieferant)) /var> ausfällst, leiden auch die Kinder darunter ...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_000<tab>Phew! We outdid ourselves this week, didn't we, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_000<tab>Puh, ich bin echt fertig. Du auch?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_001<tab>I can't wait to get back to Menphina's Arms and take a nice, long bath. Oh! And I mustn't forget the children's mealtime. Got that, Zhloe? Don't forget to feed the children... Don't forget to feed the children...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_001<tab>Ich will nur noch zurück, ein heißes, entspannendes Bad nehmen und mich um die Kleinen kümmern ...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_002<tab>Oh dear! Was I talking to myself again? Sorry about that. You take care of yourself, too! And don't forget to feed your children...er, if you have children. You don't have children, do you?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_003_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, du solltest dich auch etwas entspannen. Damit du fit bist, wenn ich wieder deine Hilfe benötige!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_000<tab>Perfect! This should make a lovely addition to Zhloe's inventory.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_000<tab>Menphinas Zuflucht dankt für diese Lieferung.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_001<tab>I must say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I've never seen treasures quite so exquisite as those you've procured for me. Why, you might be the most crafter, gatherer, and fisherer that I've met since...well, ever! Wait, did I just say “fisherer?” That's not a word...is it?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_001<tab>Die Qualität deiner Sammlerstücke ist jedes Mal hervorragend, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Von allen Abenteurern, mit denen ich bisher zusammengearbeitet habe, bist du einfach <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> beste!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_002<tab>Compared to that, my own skills as a trader leave something to be desired. But is Zhloe going to give up? Not on your life! The children are depending on me! Wait...did I forget to feed them <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((supper)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((supper)) /var>)) /var> again?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_002<tab>Ich hoffe, dass du über alle Unzulänglichkeiten meinerseits hinwegsehen kannst und mir noch lange Zeit helfen wirst.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_000<tab>Thank you for another batch of lovely treasures, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_000<tab>Besten Dank für die vielen, vielen Sammlerstücke!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_001<tab>It's strange. Even though I'm doing the selling and you're doing the crafting, gathering, and, uh, fisherering, I feel like I've learned so much from you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_001<tab>Ich glaube, ich habe als Geschäftsfrau einiges dazugelernt, seit du <var 08 E905 ((meine Partnerin)) ((mein Partner)) /var> geworden bist.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_002<tab>But there's still so, so much more to learn if I want to be half the trader that Rowena is. That's why I'm so happy that you've promised to keep helping me!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_002<tab>Wenn du nichts dagegen hast, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, schaue ich mir bei dir alles ab, was du so gut kannst. Dann kann ich irgendwann auf eigenen Beinen stehen ...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_003<tab>Wait, that wasn't just me talking to myself, right? This may come as a surprise, but I have a tendency to do that from time to time. You <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> promise, didn't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_003<tab>Bis dahin dauert es aber noch eine Weile, also auch weiterhin auf gute Zusammenarbeit!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_Q1_000_000<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A1_000_001<tab>But of course!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A1_000_001<tab>Gemeinsam schaffen wir das!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A1_000_002<tab>Actually, about that...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A1_000_002<tab>Muss das sein?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_010<tab>Oh, thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You're such a wonderful role model for me. I'll be watching you closer than ever to see just how I should carry and conduct myself!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_010<tab>Ja! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, du bist mein großes Vorbild!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_011<tab>Wait! Don't move yet! I'm watching...watching...watching...still watching! Okay, that should do for now. Carry on!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_011<tab>Wenn es dich nervt, dass ich dich so anstarre, dann musst du es sagen.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_020<tab>Wh-What!? Y-You're quitting? But why!? Could it be that Zhloe isn't as charming as she thought she was? Impossible! But how, then, to explain your completely inexplicable reaction?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_020<tab>A-Aber ... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was willst du mir damit sagen? Du meinst, ich soll mich nicht unter Wert verkaufen?!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_021<tab>...But of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var>! You must be joking with me! Tee hee! That's the best joke I heard since Adkiragh told me I talk funny. How sweet you all are, always doing whatever you can to keep Zhloe's spirits high!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_005_021<tab>Alles klar! Ich werde dir zeigen, dass ich schon eine Menge gelernt habe!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_000<tab>Thank you oh so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just when I thought you'd done it all, you still manage to amaze me!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_000<tab>Vielen Dank für die heutige Lieferung!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_001<tab>But to be honest, sometimes I worry. You've done so much for Zhloe, but what has Zhloe really done for you? I like working with you, but I wouldn't want you to waste your time unless <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> like working with me, too.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_001<tab>Nun, da wir schon so lange zu<var 16 /var>sammen<var 16 /var>arbeiten, wollte ich dich mal etwas fragen ... Bist du mit mir als Geschäftspartnerin zufrieden?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_002<tab>You can be honest with Zhloe. She's strong. She can take it. Has our little partnership been as fun and fruitful for you as it has for me?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_002<tab>Ich hab das Gefühl, dass du mir die ganze Zeit aus der Patsche hilfst, aber du sollst auch davon profitieren. Ist unsere Zusammenarbeit für dich profitabel genug?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_003<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You have no idea how happy that makes me! I feel like I could soar high into the heavens on the wings of your words!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_003<tab>W-Wirklich?! Da fällt mir ein richtig schwerer Stein vom Herzen!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_004<tab>Why, I'm so happy I just might treat myself to a fresh bowl of pineapple pudding! Even better, a fresh pineapple! With the skin, leaves, and all!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_004<tab>Ich bin grade so glücklich ... ich werde vor Freude ein ganzes Fladenbrot essen! Frisch aus dem Ofen! Jetzt sofort!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_Q2_000_000<tab>Was sagst du dazu?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A2_000_001<tab>I don't think that's a good idea...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A2_000_001<tab>Ich halte das für keine so gute Idee.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A2_000_002<tab>Um...enjoy?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_A2_000_002<tab>Ähm, na dann mal guten Hunger!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_010<tab>Heavens, what am I saying!? Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your gesture of admiration so moved me that I got ahead of myself for a moment there. It may surprise you to hear this, but I have a tendency to do that from time to time.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_010<tab>Meine Güte, was rede ich denn da!? Entschuldige, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Dein Lob ist mir grade etwas zu Kopf gestiegen.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_011<tab>That's strange. You don't look particularly surprised. Anyhow, I look forward to a long and fruitful partnership for many moons to come!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_010_011<tab>Egal, ich freue mich jedenfalls, auch weiterhin noch lange mit dir zusammenzuarbeiten!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Zhloe. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>Du hast diese Woche bereits deine Grenze an Sammlerstücklieferungen bei Zhloe erreicht.
Ab <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sonntag)) ((Montag)) ((Dienstag)) ((Mittwoch)) ((Donnerstag)) ((Freitag)) ((Samstag)) /var> um <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D0E0F101112131415161718 /var>)) 01 /var>:00 Uhr (Erdenzeit) kannst du ihr wieder Sammlerstücke liefern.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_DRESSUP_000_000<tab>Furthermore, Zhloe Aliapoh's appearance may now be altered through the use of glamours.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER1_00386_DRESSUP_000_000<tab>Als Zeichen ihres gesteigerten Vertrauens gestattet Zhloe dir nun, ihr Aussehen mit Projektionen zu ändern.
